title: Feeling yes, feeling no. Parts 1, 2 and 3
creator_credit: Moira Simpson, John Taylor, Jennifer Torrance and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: Feeling yes, feeling no Parts 1, 2 and 3 are part of a sexual assault prevention program for young children. The purpose of this video is to give children the skills necessary to protect themselves from sexual assault - from strangers, from family members, from other trusted people. Part 1 teaches children basic skills that build self-worth, self-confidence and good judgement. Part 2 reinforces the understanding of “Yes” feelings and “No” feelings and introduces skills to keep children assess potentially dangerous situations involving strangers. Part 3, introduces the issue of sexual assault by a trusted adult. Cast includes: Barbara Duncan, Fran Gebhard and Brian Torpe. (Awards: Montreal; Oakland; Mauriac)
creator_credit_for_label: Moira Simpson, John Taylor, Jennifer Torrance and National Film Board of Canada
